import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get Transaction"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/s2s/monetization-teams/{monetization-team-id}/transactions/{transaction-id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get a monetization transaction for the given monetization team by the given transaction id. Successful request will return a `200 - Success` response.
 Further details about how the [Service to Service functionality](/monetization/studio-as-purchase-server) works and can be used to operate your own purchase server is
 recommended reading prior to implementing this endpoint.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"monetization-team-id","in":"path","description":"Monetization Team ID","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"},"example":1},{"name":"transaction-id","in":"path","description":"Transaction ID","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"},"example":2}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful Request"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
